item.title: Edit Json Easily Programatically
item.description: Introduction Often I had to manipulate the JSON/YAML files. I created a utility that can help make changes in JSON/YAML easily. Get the code. git clone https://github.com/spareslant/json_manipulation.git cd json_manipulation Python version used $ python --version Python 3.9.0 How to Run: input_data_1.json contents { "data": [ { "actions": [ { "link": "http://www.facebook.com/X999/posts/Y999", "name": "Comment" }, { "link": "http://www.facebook.com/X999/posts/Y999", "name": "Like" } ], "created_time": "2010-08-02T21:27:44+0000", "from": { "id": "X12", "name": "Tom Brady" }, "id": "X999_Y999", "message": "Looking forward to 2010!
